column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here after a couple recommendations from friends. Perhaps being from Manhattan
column3: but it really wasn't all that it's cracked up to be. The patatas bravas were mediocre
column4: the mango sangria was good but didn't taste that fresh
column5: the croquettes were fine. The only thing that was delicious was the bacon mac n cheese -- but come on -- that's quite a low bar to clear.
